com.epoch.db

Class TextbookRW

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.TextbookRW
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatConstants, ContentConstants

    public class TextbookRW
extends DBCommon
implements ContentConstants
    Contains all methods pertaining to reading and writing textbooks.

      • debugPrint

        private static void debugPrint(Object... msg)

      • getBooks

        public static Textbook[] getBooks(String authorId,
                                  boolean others)
                           throws DBException
        Gets authors, names, ID numbers, and flags, but no chapters or content, of textbooks of an instructor.
        Parameters:
        authorId - the instructor
        others - whether to include textbooks written by others that this instructor is authorized to see
        Returns:
        array of Textbooks containing only superficial information (no chapters or content)
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

        Parameters:
        authorId - the instructor
        Returns:
        SQL to get the owners of books coauthored by an instructor
